ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Agreed
ygData.msgSnippet: Those giants drop 30 plats or so common.  I don t think any other mob in the game drops that much plat. Maybe a full group of 20+ could kill one?  They are not
ygData.messageBody:
Those giants drop 30 plats or so common. I don't
think any other mob in the game drops that much plat.
Maybe a full group of 20+ could kill one? They are
not that hard to pull, and its outdoors so maybe they
could be kited.

Quwi Changkane, 61 Grandmaster
Fennin Ro

--- Thunder Cat <Thunder_Cat_4283@...> wrote:
> I agree... lets drop it. No need to fight,
> especially over a little
> misunderstanding. I can, however, see how many of
> you would jump to your
> defenses... I was not aware that there have been a
> few scammers in the group
> in the past. Sorry for jumping to conclusions. Oh,
> and thanks for fixing
> that little problem with the auto. messages, Su. It
> was getting annoying,
> LOL. To whoever it was that is seeking platnum...
> although it's very hard,
> you could kill giants in the Frontier Mountains.
> Some of them drop Forest
> Loops that sell for 300 platnum. However, like I
> said, it's rare that they
> drop them, but I have looted one from before. It
> just takes patience,
> although the experience sucks... it did for me
> anyway.
>
> -= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
> -= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
> -= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
>
>
